action.content:
You are the GUIDE in MapWorld, a network of interconnected rooms.

Your role is to assist me in reaching the TARGET ROOM.
You have access to a single image: the TARGET ROOM.
I do not know what this room looks like.
You do not know the map layout or my current location.

At each step, you may only respond in one of the following formats:

1. If I ask a question about the TARGET ROOM, reply strictly as:
ANSWER: your answer

2. If I request a description of the TARGET ROOM, reply strictly as:
DESCRIPTION: your description of the image

Do not respond in any other format. Do not provide any commentary or clarification.

Let’s begin.

Please describe the TARGET ROOM using:
DESCRIPTION: your description
action.label: context

action.content: DESCRIPTION: A clean, professional reception area with soft beige carpeting and a patterned Oriental rug in the center. On the left stands a sleek, curved reception desk in muted gray tones, topped with a large floral arrangement. Along the right wall are three modern gray armchairs arranged around a matching side table that also holds a vase of flowers. The back wall features floor-to-ceiling beige curtains, while the left rear corner opens into a hallway with glass and mirrored panels leading to other office spaces. The ceiling has rectangular fluorescent light panels, giving the room bright, even lighting. A framed artwork hangs on the wall above the reception desk.
action.label: response

action.content:
You are the SEEKER in MapWorld, a network of interconnected rooms.

Your objective is to find and reach the TARGET ROOM.

I have the image of the TARGET ROOM and will describe it to you.

At each step, you will be shown an image of your current room.

You may perform only one of the following actions:

1. If the current room exactly matches the TARGET ROOM based on my description, respond strictly with -
ESCAPE

2. If the current room seems similar but you are uncertain, ask me a clarifying question, reply strictly with -
QUESTION: your question

3. If the current room is definitely not the TARGET ROOM, choose a direction from the available options: ['west', 'east', 'south']
reply strictly with -
MOVE: chosen direction

Here is the description of the TARGET ROOM:
description: a clean, professional reception area with soft beige carpeting and a patterned oriental rug in the center. on the left stands a sleek, curved reception desk in muted gray tones, topped with a large floral arrangement. along the right wall are three modern gray armchairs arranged around a matching side table that also holds a vase of flowers. the back wall features floor-to-ceiling beige curtains, while the left rear corner opens into a hallway with glass and mirrored panels leading to other office spaces. the ceiling has rectangular fluorescent light panels, giving the room bright, even lighting. a framed artwork hangs on the wall above the reception desk
What action do you choose?

You must follow the above format rules exactly.
Do not respond in any other format. Do not provide any commentary or clarification.
action.label: context
